text: Michael Faber (born 12 May 1995) is a German footballer who plays as a midfielder for DJK Vilzing. In summer 2017, he transferred from Jahn Regensburg to DJK Vilzing. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:SSV Jahn Regensburg players Category:3. Liga players
title: Michael Faber (footballer, born 1995)
